name: 2021 10th International Conference on Social Science and Humanity
content: For excellent papers accepted by ICSSH 2021, we offer publication as follow: \*International Journal of Social Science and Humanity (IJSSH, ISSN: 2010-3646, DOI: 10.18178/IJSSH, Frequency: Quarterly) Abstracting/Indexing: Google Scholar, Index Copernicus, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library \*Journal of Management and Training for Industries Abstracting/Indexing: ProQuest, EBSCO, Ulrichâ€™s Periodicals Directory CiNii (Citation Information by National Institute of Informatics, Japan), NSD-Norwegian Center for Research Data, WorldCat (OCLC), Summon JournalTOCs, Primo, Informit and Ingenta
